name: No more Chicken
description:
Embody a resigned chicken that is determinded to fight the system and free his peers from KFC !

Post Ludum:

Add an Easy mod after receive to many feedbacks on the difficulty ^^

Move with A & D

Jump with W or Space

Dash with shift

And Attack with your left click !

I need to credit Hollow knight for it music that I used 

and Loline Bongiraud for ChickenMan and Colonel Sanders !

https://www.facebook.com/Bongidraw-218385712102958/

But for everything else, it's me :)

Enjoy
